Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Migrate to Next.js full-stack architecture

BREAKING CHANGE: Complete rewrite from Express to Next.js

## What changed
- Replaced Express.js backend with Next.js API routes
- Replaced static HTML with React components
- Added centralized content management \(no hardcoded text\)
- Updated company info to Getia \(hello@getia.no, Oslo\)

## New structure
- /website - Next.js full-stack application
  - /src/app - Pages and API routes
  - /src/content - Centralized content files
  - /src/components - Reusable React components
  - /src/lib - Database, auth, utilities

## Features
- Marketing pages: home, pricing, features, about, contact, demo, industries, customers
- Authentication: NextAuth.js with credentials provider
- API routes: rosters, employees, shifts, compliance validation
- Dashboard: Basic admin interface
- Prisma: Full database schema for scheduling

## Removed
- Old Express.js backend \(src/\)
- Static HTML files \(public/*.html\)
- Mobile app \(mobile/\)
- Old test files \(tests/\)
